alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 4:37PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Stillwater, west central Big Horn, northeastern Carbon, south central Musselshell, Yellowstone and southeastern Golden Valley Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 436 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 19 miles northwest of Shepherd to near Fromberg. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusting up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Billings, Laurel, Joliet, Fromberg, Lockwood, Huntley, Pryor, Shepherd, Billings Heights, Worden, Billings West End, Ballantine, Broadview, Halfbreed Lake Wildlife, Pompeys Pillar, Edgar, Boyd, Molt, Silesia and Cooney Reservoir State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone
